entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 12:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -23.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
